Cant really compare newer cars ba. But usually hybrid vs ice  hybrid will be more exp which turns out to be around $100-200 more for instalment per mth. This turn out to be about 60-70 of litres of petrol or 150 litres if u pump at JB. So average car is abt 10-12km/litre. 70 litres = 700km~1.5kkm. Average user 15kkm/year = 1.25kkm/mth. Essentially pump abt 110 litres for ice and abt 60 litres for hybrid. 50 litres diff = 50 x $2.10 (after discount) = $100. If go JB then diff become even smaller
